verses.verse: In the beginning <WH7225> God <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH853> the heaven <WH8064> and the earth. <WH776>

And the earth <WH776> was <WH1961> without form, <WH8414> and void; <WH922> and darkness <WH2822> was upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the deep. <WH8415> And the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> moved <WH7363> upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the waters. <WH4325>
And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let there be <WH1961> light: <WH216> and there was <WH1961> light. <WH216>
And God <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the light, <WH216> that <WH3588> it was good: <WH2896> and God <WH430> divided <WH914> <WH996> the light <WH216> from <WH996> the darkness. <WH2822>

And God <WH430> called <WH7121> the light <WH216> Day, <WH3117> and the darkness <WH2822> he called <WH7121> Night. <WH3915> And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were <WH1961> the first <WH259> day. <WH3117>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let there be <WH1961> a firmament <WH7549> in the midst <WH8432> of the waters, <WH4325> and let <WH1961> it divide <WH914> <WH996> the waters <WH4325> from the waters. <WH4325>

And God <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH853> the firmament, <WH7549> and divided <WH914> <WH996> the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were under <WH4480> <WH8478> the firmament <WH7549> from <WH996> the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were above <WH4480> <WH5921> the firmament: <WH7549> and it was <WH1961> so. <WH3651>
And God <WH430> called <WH7121> the firmament <WH7549> Heaven. <WH8064> And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were <WH1961> the second <WH8145> day. <WH3117>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let the waters <WH4325> under <WH4480> <WH8478> the heaven <WH8064> be gathered together <WH6960> unto <WH413> one <WH259> place, <WH4725> and let the dry <WH3004> land appear: <WH7200> and it was <WH1961> so. <WH3651>

And God <WH430> called <WH7121> the dry <WH3004> land Earth; <WH776> and the gathering together <WH4723> of the waters <WH4325> called <WH7121> he Seas: <WH3220> and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> it was good. <WH2896>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let the earth <WH776> bring forth <WH1876> grass, <WH1877> the herb <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed, <WH2233> and the fruit <WH6529> tree <WH6086> yielding <WH6213> fruit <WH6529> after his kind, <WH4327> whose <WH834> seed <WH2233> is in itself, upon <WH5921> the earth: <WH776> and it was <WH1961> so. <WH3651>

And the earth <WH776> brought forth <WH3318> grass, <WH1877> and herb <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed <WH2233> after his kind, <WH4327> and the tree <WH6086> yielding <WH6213> fruit, <WH6529> whose <WH834> seed <WH2233> was in itself, after his kind: <WH4327> and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> it was good. <WH2896>
And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were <WH1961> the third <WH7992> day. <WH3117>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let there be <WH1961> lights <WH3974> in the firmament <WH7549> of the heaven <WH8064> to divide <WH914> <WH996> the day <WH3117> from <WH996> the night; <WH3915> and let them be <WH1961> for signs, <WH226> and for seasons, <WH4150> and for days, <WH3117> and years: <WH8141>
And let them be <WH1961> for lights <WH3974> in the firmament <WH7549> of the heaven <WH8064> to give light <WH215> upon <WH5921> the earth: <WH776> and it was <WH1961> so. <WH3651>

And God <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH853> two <WH8147> great <WH1419> lights; <WH3974> <WH853> the greater <WH1419> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the day, <WH3117> and the lesser <WH6996> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the night: <WH3915> he made the stars <WH3556> also.
And God <WH430> set <WH5414> them in the firmament <WH7549> of the heaven <WH8064> to give light <WH215> upon <WH5921> the earth, <WH776>

And to rule <WH4910> over the day <WH3117> and over the night, <WH3915> and to divide <WH914> <WH996> the light <WH216> from <WH996> the darkness: <WH2822> and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> it was good. <WH2896>
And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were <WH1961> the fourth <WH7243> day. <WH3117>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let the waters <WH4325> bring forth abundantly <WH8317> the moving creature <WH8318> that hath life, <WH5315> <WH2416> and fowl <WH5775> that may fly <WH5774> above <WH5921> the earth <WH776> in <WH5921> the open <WH6440> firmament <WH7549> of heaven. <WH8064>

And God <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH853> great <WH1419> whales, <WH8577> and every <WH3605> living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that moveth, <WH7430> which <WH834> the waters <WH4325> brought forth abundantly, <WH8317> after their kind, <WH4327> and every <WH3605> winged <WH3671> fowl <WH5775> after his kind: <WH4327> and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> it was good. <WH2896>

And God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> them, saying, <WH559> Be fruitful, <WH6509> and multiply, <WH7235> and fill <WH4390> <WH853> the waters <WH4325> in the seas, <WH3220> and let fowl <WH5775> multiply <WH7235> in the earth. <WH776>
And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were <WH1961> the fifth <WH2549> day. <WH3117>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let the earth <WH776> bring forth <WH3318> the living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> after his kind, <WH4327> cattle, <WH929> and creeping thing, <WH7431> and beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> after his kind: <WH4327> and it was <WH1961> so. <WH3651>

And God <WH430> made <WH6213> <WH853> the beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> after his kind, <WH4327> and cattle <WH929> after their kind, <WH4327> and every thing <WH3605> that creepeth <WH7431> upon the earth <WH127> after his kind: <WH4327> and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> it was good. <WH2896>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Let us make <WH6213> man <WH120> in our image, <WH6754> after our likeness: <WH1823> and let them have dominion <WH7287> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea, <WH3220> and over the fowl <WH5775> of the air, <WH8064> and over the cattle, <WH929> and over all <WH3605> the earth, <WH776> and over every <WH3605> creeping thing <WH7431> that creepeth <WH7430> upon <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>

So God <WH430> created <WH1254> <WH853> man <WH120> in his own image, <WH6754> in the image <WH6754> of God <WH430> created <WH1254> he him; male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> created <WH1254> he them.

And God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> them, and God <WH430> said <WH559> unto them, Be fruitful, <WH6509> and multiply, <WH7235> and replenish <WH4390> <WH853> the earth, <WH776> and subdue <WH3533> it: and have dominion <WH7287> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea, <WH3220> and over the fowl <WH5775> of the air, <WH8064> and over every <WH3605> living thing <WH2416> that moveth <WH7430> upon <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> you <WH853> every <WH3605> herb <WH6212> bearing <WH2232> seed, <WH2233> which <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of all <WH3605> the earth, <WH776> and every <WH3605> tree, <WH6086> in the which <WH834> is the fruit <WH6529> of a tree <WH6086> yielding <WH2232> seed; <WH2233> to you it shall be <WH1961> for meat. <WH402>

And to every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> of the earth, <WH776> and to every <WH3605> fowl <WH5775> of the air, <WH8064> and to every thing <WH3605> that creepeth <WH7430> upon <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> wherein <WH834> there is life, <WH5315> <WH2416> I have given <WH853> every <WH3605> green <WH3418> herb <WH6212> for meat: <WH402> and it was <WH1961> so. <WH3651>

And God <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH853> every thing <WH3605> that <WH834> he had made, <WH6213> and, behold, <WH2009> it was very <WH3966> good. <WH2896> And the evening <WH6153> and the morning <WH1242> were <WH1961> the sixth <WH8345> day. <WH3117>
